author: radekkapka
content:
A few comments about today's ACDC:
- discussions after the second presentation could have been taken offline, similarly to the first presentation; they took most of the meeting and were mostly concerned with the EL
- if there are presentations in the future, maybe they could be moved to the 2nd part of the meeting so that those primarily interested in CL updates have an option to leave the meeting before presentations start?

author: smartprogrammer
content:
Just one comment about the presentation, it is actually concerned with CLs as the implementation for this research will be done in the CL side..
But valid points regardless
